Cocokind Turmeric Illuminating Solution Treatment

Brand: Cocokind

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCOLIC ACID, GLUCONOLACTONE1, MANDELIC ACID, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, LYSOLECITHIN, SCLEROTIUM GUM, SODIUM BENZOATE, CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) ROOT EXTRACT, SODIUM GLUCONATE, PULLULAN, XANTHAN GUM, GLYCERIN,

NTHAN GUM, GLYCERIN, SILICA, CALCIUM GLUCONATE, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL EXTRACT.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
